page.title: 06FARMER GORDON'S DAY IN DUNS
page.content: MR GORDON IS ONE OF OUR LOCAL FARMERS.HE GETS UP AT 7.00 AND WASHES, SHAVES,PUTS HIS CLOTHES ON AND EATS HIS BREAKFAST.AT 7.30 HE GOES OUT AND FEEDS ALL THE PETS.HE THEN GIVES THE SIX FARM WORKERS THEIR INSTRUCTIONS. DURING THE DAY HE PATROLS THE FARM SEEING IF EVERTHING IS GOING ACCORDING TO SCHEDULE.THE MEN STOP FOR THEIR LUNCH AT 12.00 AND START WORKING AGAIN AT 1.00. THROUGH THE AFTERNOON HE GOES INTO HIS OFFICE AND WORKS AT HIS PAPERS TILL 5.00.THE MEN BRING THEIR MACHINERY IN AT THIS TIME AND THEN LOCK UP FOR THE NIGHT.
